scripts.dev: if [ -f ../../packages/core/package.json ]; then pnpm -C ../../packages/core build && pnpm -C ../../packages/integrations/vercel-ai build; fi; next dev --webpack
scripts.build: if [ -f ../../packages/core/package.json ]; then pnpm -C ../../packages/core build && pnpm -C ../../packages/integrations/vercel-ai build; fi; next build --webpack
